tuv.seg: The President represents all the people of Ireland
Is é/í an tUachtarán ionadaí mhuintir na hÉireann
He or she makes State visits abroad and also receives other Heads of State on visits to Ireland at the official residence, Áras an Uachtaráin
Téann sé/sí ar chuairteanna stáit chuig tíortha thar lear agus san Áras an Uachtarán fáiltíonn sé/sí roimh ceannairí stáit eile atá ar chuairt in Éirinn
The President plays an active role in promoting Ireland's image and role in the international arena
Tá ról gníomhach ag an Uachtarán íomhá na hÉireann a chur chun cinn thar lear agus i gcúrsaí idirnáisiúnta
The current President of Ireland is Michael D
At home, the President undertakes a wide range of public engagements, attending conferences and meetings, both formal and informal, throughout the island of Ireland
In Éirinn, tá go leor imeachtaí ar bun ag an Uachtarán, ag freastal ar chomhdhálacha agus ar chruinnithe, foirmiúil agus neamhfhoirimiúil, ar fud na hÉireann
The President also oversees the President's Award
Tá an tUachtarán i gceannas ar na Duaiseanna Gaisce
